transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello ji sir.
Customer: Mam good morning trading company me baat ho rahi meri.
Executive: Ji sir aapki hello.
Customer: Ji mam Utkarsh baat kar raha hu India Mart se mam kaise hai aap.
Executive: Ji sir boliye.
Customer: Mam aapko ek concern aaya tha aapne wo buylead ka kuch issue aapne fir se concern raise kiya tha mam.
Customer: Sir actually teeno location jo hai na usme koi lead hi nahi aa pa raha hai.
Executive: Mam yaha pe jo concern aapka aaya tha na ki ek minute rukiye mai aapko bata raha hu aapko aaya tha ki matlab paanch din se koi buylead aapko nahi aa rahi hai aur hamara mam hamari to last time aapko maine baat bhi kara tha ek din pehle maine aapko jo lead vagaira ka bataya bhi tha kaise kya karna hai mam.
Customer: But wo aap bole the filter apply karna hai daily check karna but filter apply karne ke baad bhi yaha pe show kar raha hai no relevant.
Executive: Mam wo basically kya hota hai na mam dekhiye jo Dumka Deoghar aur Gridh is location ki agar available nahi hoti hai na mam then aapko waha pe show nahi hota mam aur buylead to mam continuously aa rahi hai jaise kal ek mai aapko kal ki buylead aapko mai bata raha hu aapne jo consume kari hai ek minute mam call pe rahiye.
Executive: Ye cotton 19 hand gloves ki aapne consume kar dijiye na mam Godda location ki.
Customer: Sir mera ye to kiya hi nahi hai.
Customer: Hello Godda Godda location hamara nahi hai sir.
Executive: Mam Godda location sir Godda location me bhi hum log.
Executive: Accha ye sir wo location hamara nahi hai.
Executive: Accha accha ye jo diesel generator ki aapne char ko kari thi theek hai char ko Dumka Dumka location ki kari thi mam ek tarikh ko Gridh location ki kari thi.
Customer: Hello nahi wo hamara location nahi hai sir.
Executive: Theek hai theek hai jo mam aapko jo aap bata rahe the aapko teen city ki buylead nahi aa rahi Dumka location ki dekhiye char tarikh ko aapne consume kari thi ek tarikh ko Gridh location ki kari thi mam.
Customer: Actually sir problem ye ho raha hai na ki jo notification jo aata hai yaha pe show bahut late se karta hai notification to aata hai jab open karke dekhte hai to lead show nahi karta bahut late response karta hai.
Executive: Mam aap kis pe matlab system pe active rehte ho ki mobile pe active rehte ho.
Customer: Dono me hi active rehte hai but bahut late response karta hai.
Executive: Accha dono me active rehte ho.
Executive: Theek hai mam usko ek bari aap notification bhi check kar sakte kar lena aap jaise ki sometime kya hota hai aapko notification aaya aapne consume kiya jaise previously aapne mam bataya tha na ki aapne lead consume kari but maine aapko guide kiya tha ki lead manager pe waha pe show hota hai aur sometime kya hota hai ki jo us city ki high sold category hoti hai na mam to wo jab in a second mam jab consume ho jati hai na then wo waha pe aapko notification aata hai mam.
Executive: Jaise aapne jo dala tha na ki paanch din se aapko buylead vagaira aayi nahi hai mam ek bhi.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: To isliye maine aapko mam bataya ki basically daily basis pe is location ki nahi available hogi isliye mam show nahi hoti mam abhi mai ek bari abhi mai check kar le raha hu apni teen location ki mam please ek bari call pe rahiyega.
Customer: Ji sir.
Executive: Gridh ki.
Executive: Mam ye Dhanbad kitne kam ki nahi Dhanbad Jharkhand ki.
Customer: Nahi Dhanbad me bhi hamara nahi hai location.
Executive: Theek hai Deoghar.
Executive: Dumka location hai na apni Dumka.
Executive: Mam abhi dekhiye un teeno location se aaj buylead available nahi hai mam theek hai mam.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Mam is location pe abhi buylead available nahi hai isliye aapko waha pe show nahi ho rahi mam aur is location pe jab available hoti hai tab aapko waha pe show hoti hai mam dekhiye char tarikh ko aapne Dumka ki aap sochi to aapne mam consume kari thi mam.
Executive: Ek bari mai call pe rahiye mai confirm kar bhi le raha hu ek bari theek hai call pe rahiye mam.
Customer: Theek hai sir ek minute call pe rahiye.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Ha boliye.
Executive: Mam wo wahi keh rahe hai aapko daily basis pe hi mam check karna padega mam us location ke liye mam agar dekhiye us same time pe mam available hoti hai then aapko waha pe mam show hogi mam buylead.
Customer: Theek hai sir.
Executive: Mam dekhiye iska yahi solution hai mam ki aapko daily basis pe mam check karna padega jab us location pe hongi mam specific available tab aap us pe kar sakte hai mam.
Customer: Theek hai sir.
Executive: Yes mam yes mam ye cheeze kar sakte hai mam aap.
Customer: Ya fir matlab lekin time pe response to hona chahiye na isme show bahut late se karta hai jo bhi notification aaya rehta hai.
Executive: Accha notification aapko late aa raha hai.
Customer: Ha wo to time pe aana chahiye na.
Executive: Hmm hmm samajh gaya mam.
Executive: Mam notification aapko us pe mail pe aata hai.
Executive: Hello ha boliye.
Executive: Notification aapko to mail pe aata hoga na mam nahi site me bahut ha bahut late se show karta hai.
Executive: Accha accha to mai bata raha hu.
Executive: Hello ha boliye.
Executive: Mam ek kaam kariye aap buylead pe jaiye ek bari ha aapko dekhiye waha pe na past buylead dikh rahi hongi past past karke ha show kar raha hai theek hai is pe na mam is pe dekhiye yaha pe aapko yahi jo aapki sold out hui hai is location ki hai matlab agar available thi to inhone sold out ho gayi hai to aap na thoda us pe na aap matlab active rahiye sold out pe ja ke na filter select kariye waha pe I am interested ka aa raha hoga mam past lead pe jaiye pehle ha pehle past lead pe jaiye ha past lead pe jane ke baad me apne teeno location ek ek bari select kariye.
Executive: Mam wo platform pe nahi available ji ji ye past lead bataiye sir Gridh filter lagane ke baad bhi yaha pe Dhanbad show kar raha hai.
Executive: Ha mam wo buylead available nahi hongi platform pe isliye show nahi ho raha hai.
Customer: To isme fir kya check karna hai I am interested.
Executive: Mam agar isme suppose kabhi kabhi kya hota hai ki paanch seller ek buylead ko consume karte hai theek hai suppose wo buylead matlab wo seller use kar le raha hai to usko aap past lead me ja ke wo check karke I am interested kar sakte hai to aapko usse related buylead aayegi isliye ye activity karna apne ko agar buylead nahi hai hamare platform pe to aapko show nahi hogi mam.
Customer: Hmm theek hai.
Executive: Yes mam aur aap na please mera number aapko mam maine note down karwaya tha kisi bhi time mere ko 9 to six call kar sakte hai mam aap ab ek bar apna number bata dijiye mam mai aapko call kar lu mam sorry whatsapp message call matlab dono kar lu mam number bataiye aap isi me kar lijiyega na.
Executive: Accha yahi aapka number hai matlab yahi hai theek hai mai isse message aapko drop kar raha hu whatsapp me theek hai aapko kisi bhi time issue ho to isse aap kar lena theek hai mam theek hai sir okay hello hello theek hai sir aur mam ye mai concern hello mai concern mam close kar raha hu theek hai apne side se.
Customer: Sir ye but aap nahi correct kiye ho yaha pe jo aa raha hai as per your current location we are unable to show any relevant buylead.
Executive: Mam us location ki nahi available hai isliye mam aapko show ho raha hai mam us location ki buylead nahi hai available platform pe isliye aapko show ho raha hai jab aap mam India filter select karoge na to aap ab ek bar India filter aap select karo ek bari ha to waha pe aapko alag alag state ki location show hongi mam ha hota hai ho raha hai yes mam other state us us location ki buylead nahi hai waha pe that's why aapko nahi show ho raha mam waha pe mai aapko wo cheez keh raha hu aapko theek hai sir theek hai mam mai concern close kar raha hu yaha se apna aap mera number bhi hai mai aapko whatsapp message bhi drop kar raha hu theek hai sir theek hai mam please mam usko na mam usko CLM use kariyega mam wo hamare liye hota hai mam theek hai mam mai aapko message drop karta hu.
summary:
Concerns:

- No leads in three locations.

- Notifications are delayed.



Resolution:

- Executive checked the locations, no leads available.

- Suggested checking past leads and using filters.

- Suggested checking daily for available leads.

- Executive will send a WhatsApp message.



Next Steps: 

- Executive to send WhatsApp message.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, location, notification, filter, platform
